p: Several IDA approaches are used in the literature such as the generalized Fisher index (GFI) method, refined Laspeyres index (RLI) method, logarithmic mean Divisia index (LMDI) method, and Shapley decomposition method. Among these mentioned decomposition techniques, the LMDI approach was recommended by Ang (2004) over other techniques due to its advantages. These advantages can be listed as time independence, ability to handle zero values, and consistency in aggregation (Malla, 2009).
